schema.title: ReservoirSimulationModel
schema.description: A Reservoir Simulation Model assembles models of the static and dynamic characteristics for use in mathematical modelling of the reservoir.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

GridID.title: Grid ID
GridID.description: Identifies the specific 3D grid from the earth model/static geologic model, which is used in this reservoir simulation. This grid will define both the horizontal and vertical C.R.S.

ReservoirSimulationInitialisationTypeID.title: Reservoir Simulation Initialisation Type ID
ReservoirSimulationInitialisationTypeID.description: Identifies the initialisation method used for this reservoir simulation, whether enumeration, equilibrium, or mixed.

ReservoirSimulationPropertySets.title: Reservoir Simulation Property Sets
ReservoirSimulationPropertySets.description: Identifies the grid properties within the associated 3D geologic model that are inputs to the reservoir simulation.

items.title: Property
items.description: Identifies a grid property from the associated 3D geologic model that is an input to the reservoir simulation.

PropertyIndex.title: Property Index
PropertyIndex.description: Incremental Number identifying the property in this specific Simulation Model Array

ReservoirSimulationPropertyTypeID.title: Reservoir Simulation Property Type ID
ReservoirSimulationPropertyTypeID.description: Identifies the specific type of modelling this property is capturing.

PropertyID.title: Property ID
PropertyID.description: Identifies the generic property capturing the region split of this specific property.

RockModelAssignments.title: Rock Model Assignments
RockModelAssignments.description: Identifies the rock model components (e.g. rock physics model, saturation functions) used as inputs to reservoir simulation and mapped to 3D model regions.

items.title: Rock Model Assignment
items.description: Describes the association between one rock model component (e.g. rock physics model, saturation functions) and its corresponding allocated region(s) in the 3D static model.

PropertyIndex.title: Property Index
PropertyIndex.description: Index of the property, in the property array, this assignment is describing.

RegionCodes.title: Region Codes
RegionCodes.description: Code or set of codes defining the region(s) to be assigned - in the corresponding 3D Property - with this specific rock model.

ModelID.title: Model ID
ModelID.description: Identifies the rock model associated to the specific region(s).

MappingTypeID.title: Mapping Type ID
MappingTypeID.description: Identifies the subset of the Rock Model this mapping is describing

FluidModelAssignments.title: Fluid Model Assignments
FluidModelAssignments.description: Identifies the fluid models (e.g. black oil, compositional) used as inputs to reservoir simulation and mapped to 3D model regions.

items.title: Fluid Model Assignment
items.description: Describes the association between one fluid model and its corresponding allocated region(s) in the 3D static model.

PropertyIndex.title: Property Index
PropertyIndex.description: Index of the property, in the property array, this assignment is describing.

RegionCodes.title: Region Codes
RegionCodes.description: Code or set of codes defining the region(s) to be assigned with this specific fluid model.

ModelID.title: Model ID
ModelID.description: Identifies the fluid model associated to the specific region(s).

EquilibriumModelAssignments.title: Equilibrium Model Assignments
EquilibriumModelAssignments.description: Identifies the reservoir equilibrium models used as inputs to reservoir simulation and mapped to 3D model regions.

items.title: Equilibrium Model Assignment
items.description: Describes the association between one equilibrium model and its corresponding allocated region(s) in the 3D static model.

PropertyIndex.title: Property Index
PropertyIndex.description: Index of the property, in the property array, this assignment is describing.

RegionCodes.title: Region Codes
RegionCodes.description: Code or set of codes defining the region(s) to be assigned with this specific equilibrium model.

ModelID.title: Model ID
ModelID.description: Identifies the equilibrium model associated to the specific region(s).

EarthModelInterpretationID.title: Earth Model Interpretation ID
EarthModelInterpretationID.description: Identifies the Earth Model Interpretation holding the geological model and its whole set of representations. This direct relationship to Earth Model is not always necessary, but may be useful in rare cases where a gridless model is used or to more quickly navigate to a version of the 3D Grid at a different resolution.

ReservoirSimulationTypeTagIDs.title: Reservoir Simulation Type Tag IDs
ReservoirSimulationTypeTagIDs.description: List of higher level grouping terms that are used to search for reservoir simulation models, based on various aspects of model type, such as purpose of the model, model scale, and more.

BasisOfModelling.title: Basis Of Modelling
BasisOfModelling.description: This set of attributes represents the context surrounding the processes used in running through model characterization.

InputDataCollectionID.title: Input Data Collection ID
InputDataCollectionID.description: Identifies the Persisted Collection containing relevant data used to derive this model.

ModellingApplicationsUsed.title: Modelling Applications Used
ModellingApplicationsUsed.description: The software applications used in creating this data. Best practice is to also capture the application version.

IntendedWorkflowUsageIDs.title: Intended Workflow Usage IDs
IntendedWorkflowUsageIDs.description: Identifies the subsequent business workflows for which this data is intended to be used.
